effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
effect.legends_za: Inflicts regular damage. Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
effect.mega_dimension: Inflicts regular damage. Power directly relates to the target’s relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
short_effect.legends_za: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
short_effect.mega_dimension: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
